templates.name: svelte
templates.description: Svelte template with typescript, and tailwind built in.
additional_descriptions: Run npm install to install dependencies.
Run npm run dev to start the dev server.
Run npm run build to build the project.

templates.name: bah
templates.description: Bahbah template with typescript, and tailwind built in.
additional_descriptions: Run npm install to install dependencies.
Run npm run dev to start the dev server.
Run npm run build to build the project.
